children.name: Chassis
children.description: Main chassis structure of the machine, contains the frame and the base.

children.name: Angle column
children.description: Connects the structure to the base and the sliding pipes.

children.name: Column head
children.description: Connects the three pipe ends together, also the belt should attach to it.

children.name: Horizontal pipe bracket
children.description: Holds one of the two horizontal pipes.

children.name: Bracket support
children.description: Connects the horizontal pipe brackets to the vertical pipe bracket.

children.name: Column foot
children.description: Connects the column to the base and provides a regulation screw to adjust the heigth.

children.name: Metallic finger
children.description: Steel finger to move the pipe up for adjustment.

children.name: Base assembly
children.description: MDF board with holes and threaded inserts.

children.name: M8 Wood Threaded Insert
children.description: Threaded insert for wood sheets, OD 26mm

children.name: Side assembly
children.description: The pipe where the slider rolls. Holds the belt clamps.

children.name: Belt clamp assembly
children.description: The assembly of the belt clamp.

children.name: Belt clamp
children.description: Holds to the pipe and clamps the belt.

children.name: X and Y slider
children.description: Move the gantry in the XY plane.

children.name: Bearing spring
children.description: Spring that attaches to the slider body and maintains contact with the pipe.
children.comment: Needs CAD polishing, smooth the angle of the holes.

children.name: Pipe bracket
children.description: Attaches to the slider body and connects it with the central pipe.
children.comment: redesign to remove slack, add 2 screws

children.name: Belt guard
children.description: Prevent the misalignment of the belt.

children.name: Brushes assembly
children.description: circular brushes that cleans the pipe before the slider.

children.name: Motor assembly
children.description: Motor mount that attaches over the slider assembly.

children.name: Central pipe
children.description: Central pipe for the sliding of the gantry with endstops.

children.name: Endstop ring
children.description: Connects the endstop switch to the central pipe.

children.name: Gantry
children.description: Holds the tool and moves it in the z direction.

children.name: Z axis
children.description: Holds the tool and moves it up and down.

children.name: Tool assembly
children.description: Assembly of the tool and the tool-holding brackets.
children.comment: Needs CAD polishing. Update after buying the router. Add hardware.

children.name: Tool plate
children.description: The standard plate for tools attachment.

children.name: Tool bracket
children.description: Holds the tool attached to the plate.

children.name: Elevator assembly
children.description: Motor housing, lifting screw and structure pipes for lifting.

children.name: Motor mount
children.description: Holds the motor attached to the aluminum pipes.
children.comment: may need a redesign later on

children.name: Vacuum assembly
children.description: Connector to the vaccum and brushe

children.name: Gantry slider assembly
children.description: Slider for the X, Y and Z axis.

children.name: XY slider main body
children.description: Main piece of the XY slider.

children.name: Z slider main body
children.description: Main piece of the Z slider.

children.name: Electronics and boards
children.description: The whole electronics and boards assembly.
children.comment: Last thing to add in the CAD files.
